name: Hot Shot BBALL - On Fire
description:
Hot Shot BBALL - ON FIRE

Time to Break Out!

Hot Shot Basketball!! Welcome to March Madness!

How many shots can you make in this Basketball game?

Shoot 2 and 3 Point Shots until the timer runs out!

Gamecenter Enabled!! Multiple Achievements and Leaderboards!

VERY RE PLAYABLE!

GET 7 shots in a row to go ON FIRE!!

DOWNLOAD TODAY!
